name: @TMX_PLUGIN_NAME@
description: CDASim Adapter is the V2X-Hub plugin that facilitates the connection between the CDASim simulation environment and V2X-Hub and CARMA Streets.

configuration.description: The log level for this plugin
Cartesian X coordinate in simulated map (in meters).
Cartesian Y coordinate in simulated map (in meters).
Cartesian Z coordinate in simulated map (in meters).

Number of connection attempts CDASimAdapter plugin will execute before failing. Valid values are any integers greater than or equal to 1. Any value less than 1 will result in unlimited connection attemtps.
Number of seconds to wait after a failed CDASim connection attempt, before retrying to establish connection.
